imdb.plot outline: Renowned chef Giada de Laurentiis and top interior designer Sabrina Soto will surprise one lucky family with a gift of a lifetime: a breathtaking, floor-to-ceiling makeover of their dated, dysfunctional kitchen and family room. Once the kitchen is complete, Giada will share some of her favorite holiday recipes with the family - the kind of meal they could only prepare in their beautiful new space. And Sabrina will have it decked out for the holidays. This will be a gift bigger than anything this family's ever imagined.
imdb.title: Holiday Kitchen Takeover
plot: Renowned chef Giada de Laurentiis and top interior designer Sabrina Soto will surprise one lucky family with a gift of a lifetime: a breathtaking, floor-to-ceiling makeover of their dated, dysfunctional kitchen and family room. Once the kitchen is complete, Giada will share some of her favorite holiday recipes with the family - the kind of meal they could only prepare in their beautiful new space. And Sabrina will have it decked out for the holidays. This will be a gift bigger than anything this family's ever imagined.::Magnetic Productions

HGTV's Sabrina Soto and Food Network's Giada De Laurentiis totally transform an ultimate viewer's kitchen and living room, and then decorate them for the holidays. They get to work on turning a small, dingy and uninspired space into the ultimate home chef's paradise - all in just one week! Once Sabrina finishes the room makeover, our lucky homeowners will learn from Giada how to create the perfect holiday meal in time for their holiday party.::HGTV
